oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthetic methodologies and structures of metal-[c-60]fullerene complexes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MATHUR, P
MAVUNKAL, IJ
UMBARKAR, SB
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: fullerene
transition-metal
complex

buckminsterfullerene c60

c-60
fullerene

crystallization
carbonyl
clusters
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A review of the chemistry of transition metal-[C-60] fullerene complexes is presented. The main focus is directed toward the different methodologies for obtaining both metal bound and ligand bound complexes of C-60, and the different types of structures which have been so far identified for metal-C-60 complexes.
